author: henning
msg: Hey look, a genuine brown paper-bag here. CLOB columns must have a ''
around their value, too. If you miss it, you won't be able to load
CLOB columns from the xml data file.
All my fault. :-) I forgot CLOB when I added the needEscapedValue in 1.4
